title: Birdo

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Egg Master**: Use any number of eggs to perform abilities.
> - 0 Eggs: Silence a target or generate an egg, cant use the same effect twice in a row.
> - 1 Egg: Learn the role of a target.
> - 2 Eggs: Place a trap on a target, next time they are attacked, they will survive and deal the attacker a Powerful attack, they may also choose to appear as any other role while this is active.
> - 3 Eggs: Boost the Koopas' moral, an extra Factional attacker may be chosen tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Get 1 egg at the end of every night.
- You may use your eggs as secret extra votes at anytime, this will consume your eggs if a lynch is reached.
- If you were to die with 3+ eggs, you will lose 2 eggs and survive instead, costs 1 extra egg everytime its used.
